meaning_str.bing:
int. 〈美俚〉呸
n. 撒尿
v. 撒尿
网络. 小便；尿尿；轴针指数安全系统(Pin-Index Safety System)

小便；尿尿；轴针指数安全系统(Pin-Index Safety System)

撒尿；（因恐惧而）尿湿（某物）；<口>激怒；惹恼

1.en: I just bet each of the guys in the card room a thousand bucks each that I could piss all over you and the bar and still make you laugh!
1.cn: 我刚和棋牌室里的每个人都赌了一千块钱，说我敢往你身上和吧台上撒尿，并且还能让你大笑！

2.en: In any case, it was quite enjoyable to see a Harvard Law Magna Cum Laude alumni piss his pants at a simple question.
2.cn: 无论如何，看到哈佛法学院校友在这个简单的问题前尿了裤子还是挺可乐的。

3.en: The Wall Street guys are keeping their bonuses, and Obama isn't going to make any reforms unless he's prepared to piss off Wall Street.
3.cn: 华尔街的家伙仍然保持着他们的红利，奥巴马没有进行改革，除非他被华尔街气疯。

0.en: It's your turn again. I'm gonna take a piss.
0.cn: 又该你问了。我去撒泡尿。

1.en: You can call me whatever you like. Take a bucket of piss and call it granny's peach tea. Take a weapon of assassination and call it deterrence.
1.cn: 你想怎么称呼都行，你把一杯尿称为奶奶的蜜桃茶，把暗杀用的武器称为震慑手段。

2.en: I know the whiskey you like to drink. I know the tune you whistle when you're taking a piss.
2.cn: 我知道你喜欢喝什么威士忌，知道你撒尿的时候吹口哨的曲调。

3.en: What the fuck you doing here? You taking a piss?
3.cn: 你他妈的还敢来这儿？好大的胆子！

4.en: You've managed to piss off every single one of them.
4.cn: 你把他们每个人都惹毛了。

5.en: Well, seeing as its purpose was to piss you off, I'd say it's spot-on.
5.cn: 要说它的用途就是让你不爽的话，我看真是恰到好处。

6.en: In case you didn't notice, that is a scary man. He's right though, the '74 is absolute piss.
6.cn: 你应该注意到了，他真的很可怕。但他说的对，74年的酒真的很难喝。

7.en: Coat. I don't have a coat. Yes, what I just noticed. I wonder why. Who are you talking to? Piss off!
7.cn: 外套。我没穿外套。对，我刚注意到，为什么呢？在跟谁说话？走开！

8.en: Fifty years from now, like in the future fifty years from now? Yeah. I sent you from the future? Yeah. Piss off.
8.cn: 距今50年后，在未来50年后的我？是的我在未来叫你来这？是的。滚蛋。

9.en: Seriously, that's your fantasy? To invest it? Oh, I'm sorry. Did I say, "invest it"? I meant, "Be cool and piss it all away."
9.cn: 正经点，你的梦想呢？投资？喔，我很抱歉，我是说投资吗？我的意思是“快乐的全部花光光”。

10.en: You know, for a smart guy you really seem to have a hard time grasping the concept don't piss off the people who handle the things you eat.
10.cn: 知道吗，作为一个聪明人，你竟然不明白一个原则，"不要惹给你准备饭的人"。

11.en: But when the scientists from the future come to my house with robot eyes and they tell me to try them on, I'm gonna tell those scientists to piss off, because Gus, I don't even want to see a world without you.
11.cn: 不过当未来的科学家来我家给我送来智能眼球，让我试着戴上它们，我会叫科学家们赶紧滚开，因为，古斯，我不想看到一个没有你的世界。
